ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then he drew back and was proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then turned his back and waxed proud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then he retreated and waxed proud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: then turned back, and swelling-up with pride,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then he turned away, and was haughty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he turned back, and was proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he turned back and was big with pride,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then he retreated, and waxed proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then turned he away in pride
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he turned his back and behaved arrogantly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then turned he back, and grew stiff-necked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then he turned back and was haughty;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he turned back and was proud;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then he retreated and grew proud
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he turned back and was proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he turned back and was arrogant
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:23] Then he turned his back, to faith, in disdain, scornful of following the Prophet (s),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then turned he away) from the Companions of the Prophet (pbuh) and returned to his family (in pride) too proud to accept faith and listen to them.
